item.title: #TIL : Stats your top-10 frequently commands
item.description: Stats your top-10 frequently commands Run this command, it will show top-10 frequently commands, explain shell

item.title: #TIL : Commands
item.description: Commands Command lsof List all opened files, sockets, pipes Eg: List processes are using port 80 (need root if port between 1-1023) # sudo lsof -i:80 List processes are using /bin/bash # lsof /bin/bash
